item.title: Market Game Analysis
item.description: Reference [1] Avellaneda, M., & Stoikov, S. (2008). High-frequency trading in a limit order book. Quantitative Finance, 8(3), 217-224.

item.title: MM with Adversarial RL
item.description: Summary 产生了自发的风险规避行为? 怎么证明的? MM表现(怎么定义?)更好 通过比较在fixed env setting 和 strategic adversarial env setting 上MM的表现 Robust to 模型不确定性 什么是做市商

item.title: PPO Algorithm
item.description: 连续控制问题, 来自Katerina Fragkiadaki课件<Natural Policy Gradients, TRPO, PPO> Policy Gradient 我一直有一个疑问, 怎么优化函数, 使得函数的输出

item.title: Cupper Shortcodes
item.description: blockquote {{< blockquote author="Carl Jung" >}} Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better to take things as they come along with patience and equanimity. {{< /blockquote >}} Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
